Posts.Content: I had my 1st chemo of FEC on 19th Dec   Had a rough week with sickness and cramps but with all the meds they give me  i got though it and am feeling like my old self again   Just dealing with the toliet problems every day now  which seems to be a problem evetyjne has   Round 2 is on 9th jan
Posts.Title: * * * December Breast Cancer Chemo Club * * *

Posts.Content: Yes i was going to see about getting sleeping tabs for next treatment
Posts.Title: * * * December Breast Cancer Chemo Club * * *

Posts.Content: I also felt dizzy  and tingling in my face and hands on 1st round
Posts.Title: * * * December Breast Cancer Chemo Club * * *

Posts.Content: Has anyone else noticed their hair going very dry and brittle  Am on day 12 of 1st round of chemo
Posts.Title: * * * December Breast Cancer Chemo Club * * *

Posts.Content: Hi I've just started my  radiotherapy  sessions I've had 3 do far. I also have started  on tamoxifen. Is anyone else on tamoxifen and rads at the same time. I finished my last chemo 25 days ago.
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ April 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: I've just finished treatment for breast cancer and i need to.get out walking again as ive put on weight. Which trainers are the best for support and comfort. Advise needed
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Thanks Weeblemum  We had a nice lunch to celebrate  But am still tired so I will just be taking it easy for a while and try and get the weigh of I've put on during  treatment  Xx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: DL ask for numbing cream for your injections.  They  sting and the cream takes the edge of it  Good luck for radiotherapy and ring that bell loud  I did  Xx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I have just finished 15  radiotherapy .sessions  Feeling ok a bit tired. Just waiting on my hair growing back  And getting back to normaliy  Good luck to all the ladies who are just starting there chemo treatments or radiotherapy. This forum was great when i was going though chemo  Xx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Well thats the last chemo done and dusted. Piccline removed as well.  I got my radiotherapy introduction today as well. So i got my boob tattooed as well  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: DL am only doing the breast exercises the breast nurse give me  Am trying to walk abit more now the weather is getting better  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Toilet tissue was a godsend for me when.i was having toliet  issues.
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Am sorry to hear some ladies are having a bad time  Am 1 week into last chemo and I think ive cried more this cycle than when i started chemo  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Sorry for your news I een someone who was in the ward with me and she is now palliative care now BUT  remember theses words  I am brave, I am bruised I am who I'm meant to be, this is me Look out 'cause here I come And I'm marching on to the beat I drum I'm not scared to be seen I make no apologies, this is me Keep strong xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Am starting my course of Herceptin injections on tuesday. Has anyone else started their injections yet  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I have started to try and take a small walk each day to build me up for radiotherapy.  met a couple of neighbours they asked me how I was doing  and the crying started it was so embarrassing. Am not used to feeling so vunerable. I suppose we have been strong throughout this chemo journey  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Aspen  Its like we're chemo twins lol We're going though the same emotions  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Ladies it' so important to keep doing our breasts exercises. My therapist was able to tell me I wasn't doing them so  I was told off. None of us wants lymphedema  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: TALIKA Lipocils Expert 10ml | SKU# UK200006259 £39.00 This is the name of the gel
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: The best way to describe my side effects of chemo are If effected my upper legs my bum right up to my mouth  It was rough but we're tough ladies and we'll et through it with the help from this group
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: One week into to last chemo treatment So am going to go for small walks and am going to try and set myself a new goal every day 1st one is when I have my breakfast I've to get a shower and get ready No more Staying in PJS Baby steps Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi katiepie  Congratulations on finishing chemo. Am also having hercerptin and radiotherapy   For Her2+ mine starts in 3 weeks they want to start it altogether along with hormone drug which i think is abit much. I have a drink usually on my good week which i enjoy  It's either a  guinness or prosecco  Can't see me stopping but I'll defiantly cut down McMillan do a feel good move more scheme it's  free you should look into that I am when i finish rads  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Ladies when did  you start to loss your eyelashes and eyebrows  My friend give me eyegel to use and my eyebrows and eyelashes are  still hanging in there. Eyebrows have thined alot but still have some same as eyelashes. I didn't put the name of it on the page incase it didn't work but if you know anyone you has been diagnosed if might be useful to them. You start using it about 3 weeks before chemo .. www.spacenk.com/.../ this is the link
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Nictaff  Its a good feeling knowing its your last chemo. I cried for 2 weeks after i got mine. Its the 4th april radiotherapy for me. I cant wait to ring that bell.  I've started the tamoxifen tablets and the  herceptin injections as well.  Its a long process.  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I got mind cut short a couple of weeks before chemo then when getting fitted for my wig I got them to shave it.  It was like  lying  on a bed of needles but a silk pillowcase solved that problem. Now am waiting on it going back. Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Am so sorry about your mum's passing. It is always so hard to lose a loved one but going though chemo at the same time is especially hard. Sending you hugs xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi aliblue I have noticed my gums are very pale. I think my teeth will.need  a good clean in a few weeks.  Do any of the  ladies feel a bit guilty finishing chemo i know i do I have a friend i have met though chemo is on chemo 4 and is struggling how do i help??  Xx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I have starting my Herceptin  injections.  And am on number 3 radiotherapy  session  So glad chemo is done and dusted.
